EmailTemplate.name: Rescheduling Registration
EmailTemplate.subject: Rescheduling Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Rescheduled Registration Appointment
Dear [Customer's Name],
We regret that your registration appointment was cancelled. Below are the new details for your registration appointment:
Unit Details:
Unit Number: [Unit Number] Unit Size: [Unit Size]
Rescheduled Details:
Date: [New Registration Date] Time: [New Registration Time]
Please ensure you arrive at the venue at the scheduled time. If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out to us.
We look forward to completing your registration smoothly.
Warm regards, Epitome Projects LLP
